OOC: Going to have to wait for tomorrow for some battle, unless Sharpedge
and his pals want to gang up on the 4 guys that all below to me. Ha.

BIC: Diskus flew ahead. All of Soulstice's Chosen Ones see at the same time
the battle. Serge and Doom Ice join the rest. Tesifier sees Technosis. He
stares at her. Impossible, she's dead! He thought...

From: <Alloran2@...>

Subject: Re: ARK


>
> :::Bluestreak/Andromeda/Sharpedge/Falcon/Snare:::
>
> ::Andromeda looks at Bluestreak::
> Andromeda: I'm in if you are.
> Bluestreak: I'm in, what should we do?
> --------------------------------------------------------------------------
----
> ---------------------------------------------
> ::Sharpedge follows the Chosen Ones, ready for some battle::
> --------------------------------------------------------------------------
----
> ---------------------------------------------
> ::Falcon and Snare realize that they are pawns in Deathsaurus' game and
> leave, headed for the Destron base::
> Falcon: We would like to join you, do you accept?
>
